channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TX
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for TX

item.title: Report E-2024030593
item.description:
Report E-2024030593

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-23
  • City: DALLAS
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Approximately 150 gallons of "Quali Pro 3D Herbicide" from one unknown-sized poly tote which had been punctured near the bottom by a rivet during loading. No Drains, Soils, or waterways were reported impacted.
